Package xyz.needpainkiller.demo.lib.filter

Class ApiFilter

java.lang.Object
xyz.needpainkiller.demo.lib.filter.ApiFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.servlet.Filter
@Component @WebFilter public class ApiFilter extends Object implements jakarta.servlet.Filter
/api/v1 으로 시작하는 모든 요청에 대한 필터

needpainkiller6512
